text: This is presenting a complete list in alphabetical order of the cricketers who have played for the Bangladesh A cricket team in the second tier of international cricket. Like other team lists, details are the player's name followed by his years active in the A team, current players to the end of the 2015–16 season. ==A== * Abdul Mazid (2014) * Abdur Razzak (2003–04 to
